---
category: news
title: "Nearly S$10 million awarded to research on deadly brain cancer"
excerpt: "Glioblastoma (GBM) is a highly aggressive type of brain cancer. Even with current standard of care, 50% of patients die within 15 months of diagnosis. With a national grant of about S$10 million, researchers in Singapore are working with overseas collaborators to address these challenges and develop new diagnostic and treatment options so patients can receive effective targeted therapy."
publishedDateTime: 2021-06-11T04:00:00Z
